title: RED WINE GRAVY
directions: Heat the oil in a deep frying pan over low heat. Add the flour and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5–7 minutes or until golden and sandy in texture. Carefully whisk in the wine. Gradually whisk in the stock. Add the tomato paste, sugar, bay leaves and peppercorns, increase the heat to medium and cook for a further 5 minutes or until thickened. Serve with beef, lamb or sausages. Makes 2 cups.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil or pan drippings
